website_summaries.verdict: This brand seems to be especially good for acne-prone skin. Just watch out for mold.
pros: You need only a very small amount of cleanser with this sponge
For normal, acne-prone, and combination skin
French green clay contains micro molecules that absorb dirt and impurities
Free of coloring, additives, and cruelty
cons: Not good for people with rosacea

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I really like this sponge. It’s quite substantial, so when one area begins to wear down, just switch to use another area. It’s soft enough that it doesn’t irritate your face or aggravate any problem areas that you may have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: permanent fixture in my skin care routine
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive combination skin with adult acne. Since adding this sponge to my beauty routine, I have far fewer breakouts, my pores seem almost invisible, and the skin tone is much more even especially around my nose and chin. I had rather prominent melasma spots on my cheeks from pregnancy that lingered for a few years, and using this almost daily has reduced (but not eliminated) them. It's surprisingly gentle, so it's kind of hard to believe that it does anything, let alone so much. One sponge usually lasts 2 months for me before losing effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped a wk to to see if skin gets better. After a wk break
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this sponge for total of 3wks. Broke out after 1wk of usages. Stopped a wk to to see if skin gets better. After a wk break , tried again, same thing happened. Thinking maybe I need to use long term for it to be effective. After using 2 wks straight, my face is the worse ever in my life
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this little sponge. I have rosacea and oily, breakout prone skin and this seems to work nicely. I've been using the sonic brush for years and so far this sponge is doing fine as an every other day tool. Just a drop of cleanser is all you need, no scratching or grittiness. Does not leave my face any redder than it already is. It also rinses quickly and completely, no residue. It dries overnight and is ready for the next day. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Activated my Rosacea
customer_reviews.text: I read this is great for all skin types and I was extremely excited to use it! However, within 3 days my peri-oral dermatitis (a form of Rosacea) started acting up again. I have had my skin under control for about 2 years, but no longer...a month after using this sponge for just one week and I'm still fighting to get back to where I was before. If you do not have sensitive skin I'm sure this product will work for you, but if you have any form of Rosacea, beware.
customer_reviews.author: Urmill11

customer_reviews.title: It is a Must Have for healthy, beautiful skin.
customer_reviews.text: This brand comes from Jeju Island in Korea. This is the purest brand of konjac sponges. The sponge is made with artesian water and organic konjac and does not contain any dyes (unlike most other brands). I will be a lifelong customer of the brand.
customer_reviews.author: Privacy

customer_reviews.title: These sponges are amazing. They leave my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are amazing. They leave my skin feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. I have combination skin and am always worried about signs of aging and my Konjac sponge is priceless in my skincare routine. I use it every morning in the shower and most nights as a part of my nighttime routine. I use it with my face wash and it leaves my skin feeling exfoliated and renewed. It's a product I can't live without! Thank you Konjac sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C.

customer_reviews.title: Magic sponge
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive/combination skin and this sponge does wonder for my face! It prevents a lot of breakouts from happening, and the only reason I know that is because the times I’ve stopped using it breakouts start happening again, the moment I start using it my breakouts stop!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Willis

customer_reviews.title: This is a little flimsier than the konjac sponge I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a little flimsier than the konjac sponge I got from Sephora but it seems to do the job. I would probably buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: A I H

customer_reviews.title: Just started using. So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Only been using for a week, so far so good. I will know better after 21 day.
customer_reviews.author: T Orr

customer_reviews.title: Best face cleanser ever
customer_reviews.text: I did not beleive that this sponge would replace my face cleaner! It is amazing and I will keep using the konjac sponge for the rest of my life and it only takes water to use. My skin is olive and naturally oily so I was skeptical at first but WOW the difference it has made!! AMAZING
customer_reviews.author: nichole clark

customer_reviews.title: Slimy, not stimulating
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes that this sponge would provide an exfoliating effect. It didn't seem to exfoliate at all. The texture of the sponge is slimy and it breaks down quickly. I wanted to like it, but ended up tossing it in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: The Purista

customer_reviews.title: Great sponge
customer_reviews.text: This is my second konjac sponge. I prefer these to using my Clarisonic. I find it much more gentle on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Roguz

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: Great facial cleansing item. You won't see a difference in your skin right away, but after a month or two I have found you can see clearer skin that has a nice glow. Makeup goes on easier as well.
customer_reviews.author: BeeMama

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: just an expensive wash cloth. just get a wash cloth. waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: NSG

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and Cleansing
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try Konjac sponges as i was curious about the product and I love new beauty items. I love it!! It's gentle yet cleansing and I use it daily. I can't wait to order more and some for my body not just my face. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Pittie Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Not overly abrasive but still seems to exfoliate well.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Ligman

customer_reviews.title: I like that it is a natural fiber sponge
customer_reviews.text: I bought the My Konjac Sponge for the second time recently. I like that it is a natural fiber sponge, as opposed to the cellulose round dish sponge-like thing I had been using. Gentle to use and does a good job cleansing my skin. Hangs easily in the shower for convenience. I also appreciate the personal communications from the company's owner and their commitment to their product.
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a sponge
customer_reviews.text: Better than my clarisonic mia. Doesn't irritate my skin and I've seen actual results pretty quickly. I also ordered a black charcoal one and a white Boscia one and this seems to be the second best after Boscia. More reasonable though. Makes my skin soft, clear, and bright. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Mamba

customer_reviews.title: Quick to use
customer_reviews.text: I use this between Clarisonic uses... I have combination acne-prone skin. I wanted something that would take away the oil but not leave my skin dry and would exfoliate to get rid of the dry flakiness. It does leave my skin soft and not feeling too tight but it does not exfoliate as well as I thought it would. It is good for late nights when I'm too tired to wash my face because it is easy to use, quick, removes makeup better than makeup wipes. However it is not a replacement for an exfoliator. I would recommend though.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: No More Dry Flaky Skiin
customer_reviews.text: I've naturally dry sensitive skin that doesn't like most exfoliation products. So I've lived with dry flaky skin for years. NO MORE, not with these sponges.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Bravo!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sponge. I've been using the product for months. My skin has been cleaner and clearer because of it and the use of washcloths is history for me! I love the feature of the string to hang the sponge up to dry when not in use. It's simple but a great product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Neff

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love using this sponge! My face feels so clean afterwards..and you don't need to use a cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this sponge!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sponge and so does my skin. So soothing, yet exfoliating! I will absolutely order another!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Y.

customer_reviews.title: I'm buying a second one!
customer_reviews.text: I've beem using this sponge for about 2 weeks. My skin was immediately softer. As time goes by it's less dramatic, but still there's a clear benefit to using this sponge. I'm buying a second one. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that it seems I should wait until I've used it longer. But I'm very iimpressed!
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Konjac sponge
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to receive my shipment since a friend had recommended the sponge so highly. I received it quickly and I love it. Very interesting texture but really makes my skin feel clean and soft. Much less harsh as an exfoliator than loofah pads. Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Debi's D'Zigns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Love it, It leaves my face feeling clean and soft I would recommend this to everyone all you need to do is chose the right one for you there is a description chart that helps with that.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Will never use anything else! It is slowly clearing my skin. I have clear skin except for by my temples (where my phone sits), and this is working awesome to clear it. Buy! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Sailormouthmom69

customer_reviews.title: works great!
customer_reviews.text: The dry areas of skin on my forehead and cheeks have disappeared and the oil beside my nose seems less after just a few days of using the green clay sponge. I've already told friends and will be ordering again. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel A Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this along with the black one and I regret it.This did nothing to help my skin, in fact, I broke out every single day I used it. I was so frustrated I didn't understand what was going on and realized using this product was the only thing I did differently. Once I stopped using it, I stopped breaking out. This thing is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: But I loved mine so much I couldn't wait to share it ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself and one for my daughter as a Christmas stocking stuffer. But I loved mine so much I couldn't wait to share it with her. When she saw mine and wanted it, I pulled out the one I had ordered for her gave it to her early. She was quite happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I am a Fan!
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of these sponges! They are perfect shape to wash/massage the face & neck. Great fibers, and infused with natural ingredients!
customer_reviews.author: Earthy Gal

customer_reviews.title: ... does exfoliate but i think the charcoal one is better. not a terrible product just not the best ...
customer_reviews.text: the sponge does exfoliate but i think the charcoal one is better. not a terrible product just not the best for my skin- it has lasted me two months and is still in perfect shape
customer_reviews.author: J. Kapetansky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This sponge is soft on the skin, but feels and looks like it's doing the job- just make sure to wring it out properly after each use and submerge it in very hot water once a month to keep it from growing mold. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Lee

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: it didn't really feel like it did much, but it did feel nice on my face at least.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great for yoyr face.
customer_reviews.text: This feels great on your face. It is especially good to use in the morning to wake up, or before shaving to make your razor glide over your face.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great Facial Sponge
customer_reviews.text: When I decided to purchase this sponge, I was not sure what I was getting, only that it appeared to be something special. I received the product and used it immediately. I loved it...When you take it out of the packaging, it is moist and ready to use. I didn't use cleanser the first time, and it felt great. Yesterday I used a little bit of cleanser just to see how it feels. The texture of the sponge feels great on the skin. I will have to try the other sponges by Konjac. I recommend this product!!! ;-))
customer_reviews.author: RC Joy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sponge. I like the larger size
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sponge. I like the larger size. It makes my face feel smooth and clean
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really didn't do much for me; Used for several weeks and didn't seem to make a different.
customer_reviews.author: Jeryna

customer_reviews.title: Best Skincare
customer_reviews.text: These sponges are natural, affordable, time-saving and give you results. I used them as a youth in Japan and suffered no teenage acne.
customer_reviews.author: Judalon

customer_reviews.title: ... about two weeks now and it is still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the sponge for about two weeks now and it is still in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Tysona

customer_reviews.title: ... Konjac Facial Sponge for only 2 weeks and I love it so much
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my Konjac Facial Sponge for only 2 weeks and I love it so much! I usually use it without any cleanser in the morning. It gives a really smooth and soft feeling so that I can be sure my moisturizer and primer stay on all day. Good product and fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Kieu Trinh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these and like them. Alternate since they take a couple of days to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lkennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, helps me exfoliate and keep my face soft & clean.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree  Baldorado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time trying the Konjac sponges - they are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Skin feels good. Pimples may have decreased in frequency
customer_reviews.text: Using for problem acne skin. Skin feels good. Pimples may have decreased in frequency.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: This leaves my skin feeling so soft, and it ...
customer_reviews.text: This leaves my skin feeling so soft, and it doesn't irritate at all. I use it with a foaming cleanser almost every time I wash my face. I think it is making my blackheads go away, too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Morris

customer_reviews.title: This feels awesome, super easy and convenient to use at night ...
customer_reviews.text: This feels awesome, super easy and convenient to use at night and in the morning. Not quite as good to remove makeup as I thought it would be but still great. I wish I had an easier way to dry it out more often, maybe a hairdryer would work? Anyways great product highly recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Lily Dugan

customer_reviews.title: helpful utensil
customer_reviews.text: feels great, works with and without a cleanser (i use just water in the morning and different kinds of cleansers in the evenings). dries well without dripping, if water is squeezed out completely. i hope to have it in use for many months!
customer_reviews.author: Juliane Teubersen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sponge
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Really leaves my skin feeling clean. Goes great with my cleansers. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Halley

customer_reviews.title: Great working and looking sponge
customer_reviews.text: I use this by itself in the mornings and it works wonders. My face is a clean slate to apply makeup on and feels so soft. Great working and looking sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Improved skin,no blemishes
customer_reviews.text: At the beginning it seemed that i started to have little bumps, but I think it was the exfoliation bringing out all the hidden toxins and residues under my skin. Also getting another one ;)
customer_reviews.author: GL

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I read an article on Refinery29.com about this "amazing new product" and so I wanted to try it. I liked it for the first week or so, but when it dried out it was nothing but a sponge. If you like the product, I would recommend buying it every 2 weeks. Its cheaper then a Clarisonic, but over time it will cost more. Try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: emehta2

customer_reviews.title: Great Exfoliator
customer_reviews.text: Love this sponge so far...it's exfoliating, but gentle enough to use on your face more than once a week. The clay also leaves my skin feeling moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Aviles

customer_reviews.title: So soft and wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sponge, it is incredibly soft and leaves my skin feeling very clean and supple. I've convinced several people I know to buy one, seriously great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed how much water this little sponge can hold. My face has been cleaner with almost no breakouts since I started using it. It squeezes out nicely as well, and I use a lot less cleanser with it than without. It's pretty awesome, and I will be ordering a few for back up one of these days.
customer_reviews.author: ThatVulcanBitch

customer_reviews.title: My teenage daughter and I love this product so much
customer_reviews.text: Young Skin, Old Skin - there is a My Konjac Sponge for everyone. My teenage daughter and I love this product so much, we have started buying them as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: stacey lasorsa

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the sponges are very thin and they rip after a week of use
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: New Stand-by
customer_reviews.text: I have combination skin that no products have worked for (Clarisonic, expensive washes and creams, etc.) Have been using this for a few weeks and so far it's doing the job perfectly. My face is mostly blemish-free and it takes 30 seconds in the shower each morning. Dries out nicely so doesn't hold bacteria as much as a washcloth, etc. Great product. I don't use any face wash with it.
customer_reviews.author: L P

customer_reviews.title: Nice Exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the shower in the mornings for washing my face. Nice exfoliation.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia D Spann

customer_reviews.title: I love this green clay Konjac facial sponge
customer_reviews.text: I love this green clay Konjac facial sponge. Soft, gentle and leaves your face so soft. I even ordered one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: W. Atwood

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very soft on the face, but strong enough to wash my face clean and smooth
customer_reviews.author: Donna Sapiandante

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not like it, I was allergic to whatever was in it
customer_reviews.author: margaret mclean

customer_reviews.title: It's a good facial sponge just make sure and squeeze it dry ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good facial sponge just make sure and squeeze it dry or else it will get mold in a month time.
customer_reviews.author: Nalini Shukla

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful cleansing option free of toxins
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful cleansing option free of toxins! Thank you! Makes my skin feel like silk and can be used with any cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Elmore

customer_reviews.title: Broke Apart :(
customer_reviews.text: I've had this sponge for a month now and was really happy with the results until I found a gash down the middle littered with black mold. I've kept it hanging off the faucet to let it dry between uses (without wringing it), so I'm not quite sure why the mold formed. Needless to say I had to toss it and am pretty bummed about that.
customer_reviews.author: amilcar guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my teen's skin
customer_reviews.text: I bought several natural products over several months to help my teen with her acne-prone skin. Nothing really helped. I was about to buy her the chemically-laden creams from the drugstore when I heard about these sponges. Her skin started improving within days and she's so happy. I ordered the red one for myself. We both love these sponges! The are gentle but really clean deeply.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Gentle exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: It makes my face feel very smooth. It doesn't irritate yet is powerful enough to smooth my heels somewhat. I don't know if there's really a difference between the types. I bought both the charcoal and green clay. If there is an effect, it is subtle. Smooth skin is the real benefit.
customer_reviews.author: Meeker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for mature skin
customer_reviews.text: I threw out my 'baby washcloths' to use this facial sponge. This does not scratch or irritate but gently exfoliates and cleanses. I use less cleanser - so will save money in the long run. Rinse after using and hang to dry. It is that wonderfully simple. I cannot wait to try the other type of Konjac Sponges. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the sponge! Bought the green clay one for combination skin. I like the shape and how "springy" it feels when infused with water. My skin feels so smooth after I use it. Sometimes I use it with my Korean foam wash, and sometimes on its own, as a facial massage tool. Great and fast service from seller.
customer_reviews.author: Pied Piper

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little product
customer_reviews.text: Very effective cleansing tool - thorough but not harsh & doesn't leave your face feeling stripped. I use this at night to get my face really cleaned & have already noticed a difference in my pores. I use the turmeric version in the morning with just a scooch of cleanser & this at night with about half the cleanser I normally used before this product. Is definitely a keeper & pays for itself. It's also almost impossible to overuse it - even though it is that gentle it really is effective.
customer_reviews.author: MaryS

customer_reviews.title: This facial sponge solved my skin problems. I have ...
customer_reviews.text: This facial sponge solved my skin problems. I have a somewhat sensitive combination skin, break-up prone. Other exfoliating cleansing solutions would irritate and dry my skin and my skin would break up after exfoliating. This sponge is very soft and gentle but somehow it is also very effective at cleansing and exfoliating. I use it every day, and my skin feels soft and smooth after every application. I use a little bit of liquid facial soap with Tea Tree Oil with this sponge. I buy it all the time, since I discovered this sponge. It is my routine now.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as an addition to my nightly routine. Very happy with the product. This is the second product I have purchased from this company. I haven't been using it long, but it has worked like I thought it would. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie R

customer_reviews.title: To Sponge or not to sponge........
customer_reviews.text: From what I read about the product in Sephora related articles and the description, I thought I would feel a fantastic "clean", but in fact, I have no idea if it's even cleaning my face???? I feel nothing, it doesn't feel like anything, I don't notice anything different, but my face does not feel clean after I use the sponge. Not sure what all the hype is..........
customer_reviews.author: KatKobe

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was fantastic. It's true life span is a week
customer_reviews.text: At first, I thought it was fantastic. It's true life span is a week. Not worth it all at and really doesn't do what it says. Got suckered because I saw it advertised on AOL with rave reviews. Rave reviews..I do not give it. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Levy

customer_reviews.title: Will continue  to buy
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and can use my facial cleanser with the sponge
customer_reviews.author: lynda trenholme

customer_reviews.title: Nice Sponge
customer_reviews.text: I like this sponge. It's soft but still exfoliates without being too harsh, and it feels really nice on my face. I can't tell if the green clay is doing anything, but I like this sponge and I will buy another one when this one is done. Great price, fast shipping. Happy with this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Love how gentle this product is on my face
customer_reviews.text: Love how gentle this product is on my face. It takes forever to dry but it fits very well in my hand and hasn't lead to any negative side effects
customer_reviews.author: Ashley O Mulder

customer_reviews.title: Don't Bother - This is All Hype
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money. Doesn't really work. You can get the same results with a wash cloth. The charcoal is fleeting and is not in contact with the skin very long at all. Ripoff for $10. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: AvidReader

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to skin care.
customer_reviews.text: I adore these sponges. I have tried the charcoal and green clay ones. I use them with Lush Coalface cleanser to wash my face and am very happy new clearer skin 😀.
customer_reviews.author: JnCMull

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but not long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my mom, who has pretty oily skin. At first it was working great, but after a few weeks it started to irritate her skin. She was squeezing, not wringing as suggested and we have a water filter on our shower, so not sure why the magic rubbed off. We may try another kind in a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Xombygirl

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it, gentle exfoliation, softer skin!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical (how does a sponge change your skin), but heard good things about konjac and gave it a whirl. I've been using for a week with my normal gentle cleanser and I AM CONVINCED. My skin is softer and brighter and I'm planning to buy these for every lady I know for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: aptess

customer_reviews.title: Ahhh, refreshing
customer_reviews.text: I like this sponge, I use it in conjunction with a foaming cleanser. I am able to use less product as this sponge gets it really foamy. It has a nice texture and feels good on the face, especially if you use cold water -- very refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha E

customer_reviews.title: Great product that stands up to its claims
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Konjac sponge and my first French Green Clay and I really like it. It has cleared up my face just using it once per day with only water. I immediately noticed that my skin wasn't as dry and was much smoother.
customer_reviews.author: SJMeadows

customer_reviews.title: This little sponge is great. I hang it in my shower and use ...
customer_reviews.text: This little sponge is great. I hang it in my shower and use it every time I shower with a little cleanser, my skin feels fantastic. I have used several other kinds of sponges before. Some take forever to soften up, others take forever to dry. This is the happy medium. I was going to buy this at Sephora, but saw it on Amazon for far less.
customer_reviews.author: victoria stewart

customer_reviews.title: Good exfoliation
customer_reviews.text: This sponge is very gentle, but does a good job of exfoliating. My pores are clear after using twice daily for a couple of weeks. The green clay seemed to last only two or three uses, however, so in the future I may just purchase the plain white sponge.
customer_reviews.author: BBM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Soft and gentle. Men - be careful, will not work with a 5 o'clock shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Urbanite1985

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Have had better results than my clarisonic
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Have had better results than my clarisonic, because this is gentler and all natural fibers. Will definitely buy more and travel with them
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite brand of konjac sponge! I have tried three different colors of My Konjac Sponge, and have been very pleased with all of them!
customer_reviews.author: mel

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: This sponge has fallen apart after about a month of use. Very disappointing. Opting for a washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: It is very nice to have something that I can scrub my face ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as exfoliating as I was hoping for. But if you have sensitive skin, then it's ok. It is very nice to have something that I can scrub my face with and rinse out without having to wash it like a rag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Stefl

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on my face and keeps it exfoliated!
customer_reviews.text: I'm enjoying using this every morning in my shower for a daily exfoliation!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: I love the sponge
customer_reviews.text: Service was exceptional. I love the sponge. I've only just started using it, but it is gentle on my skin which is feeling very good.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D. Shanks

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my roommate who has combination skin. Her skin's clearing up and she says it just FEELS healthier and more clean.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I use it every night with the and andalou naturals citrus kombucha cleansing gel and no more major breakouts! It's soft and leaves my face very smooth and fresh feeling. BUY IT
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good but the picture is misleading. I guess I thought I was getting two!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: little miracle
customer_reviews.text: This little sponge is a miracle. My face is like buttah, so soft and smooth. I prefer to use it without cleanser, just water and sponge. Then again, I don't wear makeup, so that works. If you wear makeup, using it with cleanser would be just as awesome.
customer_reviews.author: libbromus

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product and price. Makes your face feel clean and tight!
customer_reviews.author: JSN

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping and I really enjoy using the product
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and I really enjoy using the product. I don't find it too abrasive as other reviewers have mentioned. It's like a fun squishy wash cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps it was a poor batch or I was too tough on it
customer_reviews.text: Sponger broken down quicker than expected. Perhaps it was a poor batch or I was too tough on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: My Konjac Sponge All Natural Fiber French Green Clay Facial Sponge
product_meta.description:
100% Natural Luxurious Konjac Fiber Sponge ~ Chemical Free, pH Balanced, With added French Green Clay. 
Our French Green Clay Konjac Facial Sponge is excellent for normal to combination skin. 
This sponge is made from 100% pure Konjac plant root with added Natural French Green Clay, which contains micro molecules that absorb dirt, oil and bacteria while gently cleansing the pores. Your skin will feel fresh, smooth, radiant and soft. 

Since My Konjac Sponge is all natural, it can be used with your favorite cleanser, if desired. 

Link on how to use and properly care for the sponge: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7RSVG_1RR-o 

This product is Handmade in South Korea
feature_bullets: 100% Natural Sponge + 100% Coloring & Additive Free + 100% Biodegradable
Naturally Sustainable, Leaping Bunny (cruelty free) certified
Gently Exfoliates Skin & Cleanses Skin Pores
Revitalizing the Complexion. Deep Cleanses & Refreshes
Perfect for Normal to Combination Skin.
